sermons.title: Jesus Christ the Heir
sermons.description: The Father has given all that He has to the Son.  This truth is illustrated in the life of Abraham and Isaac in Genesis 24.  All blessing comes from right relationship to the Heir. God’s blessings are not detachable.  Everything is ‘in Christ.’ The life is in the Son, he that hath the Son hath life.  Is my faith in the Source or the means?
